channel.description: Recent content in docker on Zekun's Zone

item.title: Run jupyter notebook in docker container on remote server
item.description: Jupyter notebook is an extremely convieninent tool for debugging a piece of code. It runs on browser and allows you to run code piece by piece instead of fresh from the begining. With docker, jupyter notebook is slightly more confusing than it is on local machine. This short article talks about how to correctly forward the port to run jupyter notebook in docker container on remote server. We will have three locations to deal with; local machine, remote server, docker container.
